sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_619ab0ae1bbb181094edddb6bc4bcbf0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o.UI_SCRIPT_TEST</name><script><![CDATA[var x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o = x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o || {};

x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o.UI_SCRIPT_TEST = (function() {
	"use strict";

 //set your private variables and functions here. For example: 
	var privateVar = 0; 
	function private_function() {
		return ++privateVar;
	}


/* Share variables between multiple UI scripts by adding them to your scope object. For example: 
	x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o.sharedVar = 0; 

 Then access them in your scripts the same way. For example: 
	function get_shared() {
		return x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o.sharedVar;
	}
*/

	return {

/* set your public API here. For example:
		incrementAndReturnPrivateVar: function() {
			return private_function();
		},
*/
		type:  "UI_SCRIPT_TEST"
	};
})();

/**
 * Description
 * 
 * @param {any} control
 * @param {any} oldValue
 * @param {any} newValue
 * @param {any} isLoading
 * @author Nadim Rizk [rizknt@nih.gov]
 * @memberof x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o.module:sys_ui_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading)  {
   
    // This is important to prevent loop-like behavior
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
   
    var ga = new GlideAjax('QuickDateCheck');    
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name','isPastDateTime');    
    ga.addParam('sysparm_test_date', newValue);    
    ga.getXMLAnswer(checkAllowed);
   
    // Based on our script include, inform the user
    /**
     * Description
     * 
     * @param {any} answer
     * @returns {undefined}
     */
    function checkAllowed(answer){        
        if (answer !== 'true') {            
            g_form.addErrorMessage('Discovery date can\'t be in the future');
            g_form.clearValue('last_discovered');            
        }    
    }    

}
]]></script><script_name>UI_SCRIPT_TEST</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rizknt@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-14 15:52:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>619ab0ae1bbb181094edddb6bc4bcbf0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o.UI_SCRIPT_TEST</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CICD_Dev_Ops" source="x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o">60c2a2971b4cd010fe45ed39bc4bcb2a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CICD_Dev_Ops">60c2a2971b4cd010fe45ed39bc4bcb2a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_619ab0ae1bbb181094edddb6bc4bcbf0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rizknt@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-18 19:05:59</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

var testvar;
var Test_Script_Include_Demo = Class.create();
Test_Script_Include_Demo.prototype = /** @lends x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o.module:sys_script_include.Test_Script_Include_Demo.prototype */ {
    /**
     * Description
     * 
     * @returns {undefined}
     */

    },

    type: 'Test_Script_Include_Demo'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rizknt@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-14 15:30:18</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d7b67ce61bbb181094edddb6bc4bcbac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test_Script_Include_Demo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CICD_Dev_Ops" source="x_g_nci_cicd_dev_o">60c2a2971b4cd010fe45ed39bc4bcb2a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CICD_Dev_Ops">60c2a2971b4cd010fe45ed39bc4bcb2a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d7b67ce61bbb181094edddb6bc4bcbac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rizknt@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-18 19:07:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
